Hi,
   
  How can i write data driven tests in Junit?
   
  To me it seems that Junit core does not have any concept of data driven testing. If i want to do it, i will have to write lots of extra code.
   
  If in my test, i will iterate through the test data, the test will come out when it will encounter the first failure and will not run for all the test data.
   
  Regards,
  Ritesh
